featured.text: An international team of researchers focused on a population of yellow-bellied sea snakes living near Costa Rica, where rain often does not fall for up to seven months out of the year.

definition.zh_def: 海岸，尤其是指陸地與海洋接觸的地方。
definition.en_def: The land along the edge of a sea or ocean.
definition.example: We spent the day relaxing on the costa, enjoying the sun and waves.
